contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox settlement |name = Xinhua District |native_name = 新华区 |postal_code_type = Postal code |settlement_type = [[District (China)|District]] |image_skyline = |image_map = |map_caption = Location of the county |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = [[People's Republic of China]] |subdivision_type1 = [[Provinces of the People's Republic of China|Province]] |subdivision_name1 = [[Hebei]] |subdivision_type2 = [[Prefecture-level city]] |subdivision_name2 = [[Shijiazhuang]] |area_total_km2 = |population = |population_as_of = |population_density_km2 = auto |latNS = |latd = |latm = |lats = |longEW = |longd = |longm = |longs = |elevation_ft = |elevation_m = |timezone = [[China Standard Time|China Standard]] |utc_offset = +8 |website = }} '''Xinhua District''' ({{zh|s=新华区 |t=新華區 |p=Xīnhuá Qū |l=New China}}) is a district of [[Shijiazhuang]], the capital of [[Hebei]] province, People's Republic of China. [[Sanlu]], when it existed, had its headquarters in Xinhua.<ref>"[http://www.bloomberg.com/quote/SJZSGCZ:CH/profile Shijiazhuang Sanlu Group Co Ltd]." [[Bloomberg Businessweek]]. Retrieved on October 12, 2012. "Shijiazhuang Sanlu Group Co Ltd No.539, Heping West Road, Xinhua Di Shijiazhuang, 050071 China" - making it "中国河北省石家庄市市和平西路539号"</ref> ==Administrative Divisions== There are 11 subdistricts, 2 towns, and 2 townships. Subdistricts: *[[Gexin Subdistrict, Shijiazhuang|Gexin Subdistrict]] (革新街道), [[Xinhua Road Subdistrict, Shijiazhuang|Xinhua Road Subdistrict]] (新华路街道), [[Ning'an Subdistrict]] (宁安街道), [[Dongjiao Subdistrict, Shijiazhuang|Dongjiao Subdistrict]] (东焦街道), [[Xiyuan Subdistrict, Shijiazhuang|Xiyuan Subdistrict]] (西苑街道), [[Hezuo Road Subdistrict]] (合作路街道), [[Lianmeng Subdistrict, Shijiazhuang|Lianmeng Subdistrict]] (联盟街道), [[Shigang Subdistrict]] (石岗街道), [[Wuqi Subdistrict]] (五七街道), [[Tianyuan Subdistrict]] (天苑街道), [[Beiyuan Subdistrict, Shijiazhuang|Beiyuan Subdistrict]] (北苑街道) Towns: *[[Daguo]] (大郭镇), [[Zhaolingpuxi]] (赵陵铺西镇) Townships: *[[Sanzhuang Township, Hebei|Sanzhuang Township]] (三庄乡), [[Dubei Township]] (杜北乡) ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== {{Portal|China}} {{County-level divisions of Hebei}} {{coord|38|04|00|N|114|28|05|E|region:CN-13_type:adm2nd_source:kolossus-dewiki|display=title}} [[Category:County-level divisions of Hebei]] [[Category:Shijiazhuang]] {{Shijiazhuang-geo-stub}}
